General.Name: Suzhou Sushi Testing Instrument Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. provides environmental and reliability testing equipment and services and solutions. The company's products include electro-dynamic shakers, multi axis multi point test systems, electric vibration test systems, shock testers, shock response spectrum machines, centrifugal machines, vibration control and dynamic signal analysis systems, digital vibration controllers, LMS controllers, and digital vibration controllers; and electric high acceleration life and stress screening systems, and vibration temperature humidity combined environmental test systems, as well as vibration, temperature, humidity, and low pressure integrated testing systems. It also offers climate environment testing systems, such as big walk-in chambers, environmental stress screening systems, dustproof test boxes, thermal vacuum test chambers, rain test chambers, rapid temperature change test boxes, mold test boxes, high and low temperature low pressure test chambers, and temperature shock test boxes; and analytical testing systems. Its products are used to simulate vibration, shock, drop, temperature, humidity and other mechanical, climatic, and comprehensive environments. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Sushi Testing Instrument Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
